greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest prime greater than n, containing it in binary representation.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: a208238_list = f nns $ filter ((== 1) . a010051' . fst) nns where
if m == p then f mms' pps else q : f mms pps'
where q = fst $ fromJust $ find ((ms `isInfixOf`) . snd) pps'
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 14 2013
